wtomigraj

Class ReqSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • wtomigraj.ReqSender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class ReqSender
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
    ReqSender is abbreviation for Request Sender. It is a class for sending datagrams which demand response or at least datagram delivery confirmation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ReqSender(java.net.DatagramSocket ds, Receiver receiver, AddrInfo addr)
      Creates ReqSender from given socket, receiver and address.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getRetrials()
      Returns how many sending datagram should be repeated until send method gives up.
      long getWaitTime()
      Returns number of miliseconds to be waited between following retrials of packet sending.
      void propertyChange(java.beans.PropertyChangeEvent evt)
      Listens for changes of the receiver.

      Sends message.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReqSender

        public ReqSender(java.net.DatagramSocket ds,
         Receiver receiver,
         AddrInfo addr)
        Creates ReqSender from given socket, receiver and address.
        Parameters:
        ds - DatagramSocket which will be used to send datagrams.
        receiver - receiver which may receive a response. ReqSender will be informed when response arrives.
        addr - Address to which this ReqSender will send packets.

    • Method Detail

      • propertyChange

        public void propertyChange(java.beans.PropertyChangeEvent evt)
        Listens for changes of the receiver.
        Specified by:
        propertyChange in interface java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
        Parameters:
        evt - changed property of receiver.

      • send

        public void send(org.json.JSONObject json,
        Handler rHandler)
          throws ConnectionException
        Sends message. It blocks the thread until confirmation is received or method gives up.
        Parameters:
        json - JSON object which is going to be sent.
        rHandler - Handler called after response arrives.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - when delivery of packet was not confirmed.

      • getRetrials

        public int getRetrials()
        Returns how many sending datagram should be repeated until send method gives up.
        Returns:
        how many sending datagram should be repeated until send method gives up.

      • setRetrials

        public void setRetrials(int retrials)
        Send numbers of retrials.
        Parameters:
        retrials - number of retrials of sending packet which will be made unless we get confirmation of delivery.

      • getWaitTime

        public long getWaitTime()
        Returns number of miliseconds to be waited between following retrials of packet sending.
        Returns:
        number of miliseconds to be waited between following retrials of packet sending.

      • setWaitTime

        public void setWaitTime(long waitTime)
        Sets wait time between retrials.
        Parameters:
        waitTime - wait time between retrials.
